import React, { Component, Fragment} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; const QuizInstructions = () => ( Nimelssa Quiz - Instructions page

NIMELSSA QUIZ RULES AND REGULATIONS

Ensure you read this guide from start to finish

  • The quiz has a duration of 10 monutes and ends as soon as your time elapses
  • The quiz consist of 50 questions
  • Each question has four options
  • Select the option which best answers the question by clicking (or selecting) it
  • Each game has two life lines namely
    • 2 50-50 chances
    • 5 Hints
  • Select a 50-50 life li
 ) export default QuizInstructions;
